login.title: Congratulations,
login.subtitle: You can now join our beta test program!

first.title: A clean (and smart) inbox
first.paragraph: Free Your Inbox safely learns your habits to smartly predict which emails you want to receive.

second.title: Unclutter your inbox effortless
second.paragraph: Free Your Inbox smartly and automatically filter out emails for you. It only takes you 1 clic to confirm our filtering. The more you train us the better we become. In less than 1 week, your inbox is sane for ever.

third.title: Reduce the time you spend on emails
third.paragraph: Free Your inbox makes sure you spend less and less time on your emails. You are now on only interrupted by emails that deserve to be read, answered or kept. Any other type of emails will stay out of your inbox. You focus on what matter.

fourth.title: It's time to Free Your Inbox
